title: MS AccessCurrentUser()Function

metadata.description: Learn about MS AccessCurrentUser()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
❯
Example
Return the name of the current database user:
SELECT CurrentUser();
Definition and Usage
The CurrentUser() function returns the name of the current database user.
Syntax
CurrentUser()
Technical Details
Works in:
From Access 2000

❯
★
+1

summary: This tutorial covers MS AccessCurrentUser()Function concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use MS AccessCurrentUser()Function effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of MS AccessCurrentUser()Function and how to apply it in your projects.
